delivery_issue: Broken board outside the home that shows the address number

notes.driver_notes: I accept responsibility for the damage
notes.customer_notes: I'm old customer of more. Most of my home furniture was from Mor furniture. However, this experience was bad. First, delivery team did property damage with there truck ( I'm still following up for getting that fixed). Also in this salesperson did confusion with us. He did not make clear that he is giving us dinning table without leaves. We felt like Mor has cheated with us. If u were selling dinning table without leaves (that come with leaves) then it should be made clear that is reason of discount. Additionally, table came with many new scratches. Very unhappy :-(.
